recipesJson.description:
Loops & crunchy marshmallows in strawberry milk.

Not a clone of Wayne's CMSM or NCV's excellent STRAWB. Promise.

##NOTACLONE #REMEMBERBRONUTS

reviews.text: Have it all with the exception of PUR SMC. gonna have to pick it up and try it. Thanks for this recipe. I looks great.
